product_name: Superfeet merinoGrey Premium Insoles - Medium to High Volume
long_description: Superfeet merinoGREY premium insoles offer the comfort of merino wool atop a supportive platform for enhanced support in medium to high volume boots, shoes, loafers or other work or casual footwear. Thick merino wool top cover offers natural temperature-controlling, antibacterial and moisture-wicking performance whether you're trekking around town or down a trail. Layer of high-impact, closed-cell foam delivers low-profile shock absorption and enhanced comfort for all-day wear. 3/4-length polypropylene heel caps cradle heels, stabilize feet and provide arch support; reinforced midfoot area helps maintain midfoot flexibility. Recommended for low-impact activites; low profile makes these well suited to casual or tighter-fitting shoes. Superfeet merinoGREY premium insoles accommodate all arch types, though are ideal for medium- to high-arched feet.
short_description: Superfeet merinoGREY premium insoles offer the comfort of merino wool atop a supportive platform for enhanced support in medium to high volume boots, shoes, loafers or other work or casual footwear.
